EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Best Practices for EMS Billing - Tomorrow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> REMINDER: The Webinar You Registered for is Tomorrow
Best Practices for EMS Billing
{{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}} - this is your reminder for tomorrow's webinar.
Larry and Kathy look forward to discussing EMS Billing Best Practices with you, including:
- Daily tips for improving your EMS billing processes - Catching and catching potential 'red flags' - from call intake and field documentation to invoice production and reimbursement to billing and collections - Maximizing your billing and collections - Actual examples from EMS services and lessons learned
See you online tomorrow!
Questions? Cheri Lane, Marketing Communication Manager
800-537-3927, ext. #6278 cheri.lane@tritech.com <mailto:cheri.lane@tritech.com> WEBINAR DETAILS JOIN LINK: {{member.webinar url:default=URL}} DATE: Thursday, June 28, 2012
TIME: 2 PM ET l 1 PM CT l Noon MT l 11 AM PT
SPEAKERS: Larry Cole, TriTech Regional Sales Manager and Kathy Ransom, TriTech EMS Industry Education Coordinator, C.A.C.
AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial in over the telephone to the number shown on your screen after login
Trouble logging in? Call 800-263-6317 to reach the GoToWebinar Support Team
